author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
In honor of Tolkien Reading Day, I'm sharing my Tolkien Reading Order - including the new books we've gotten over the past few years like The Fall of Númenor, the new edition of Tolkien's Letters, and the Poems of J.R.R. Tolkien Collection!

Middle-earth Reading Order
The Hobbit - https://amzn.to/41P10fu
The Lord of the Rings - https://amzn.to/4iSqdN0
The Children of Húrin - https://amzn.to/4bZ49Oj
The Silmarillion - https://amzn.to/4bOztPL
The Fall of Númenor - https://amzn.to/4iSmkHR
Unfinished Tales - https://amzn.to/41Tgn6F
The Adventures of Tom Bombadil - https://amzn.to/4bNWz9j
Beren and Lúthien - https://amzn.to/4huKLtK
The Fall of Gondolin - https://amzn.to/4kUDA0X
The History of Middle-earth (12 books) - https://amzn.to/4iNVuAz
The Nature of Middle-earth - https://amzn.to/4kTket8
The History of the Hobbit - https://amzn.to/4iT9byh
The Letters of JRR Tolkien (Expanded Edition) - https://amzn.to/4bV8DFS
The Collected Poems of JRR Tolkien - https://amzn.to/4hyr1FB

Further Read
title: Tolkien Reading Order in 2025
